predicate.note: Frames file for 'rivet' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to focus or hold one's attention

example.name: Arg2 as a subject
example.text: The playoff series had riveted the 12-year-old Giants fan .

example.name: prepositional Arg2
example.text: But attention also rivets on who [*T*-1] finishes last , and Pine Bluff , Ark. -- which [*T*-2] finished third to last in 1981 and second to last in 1985 -- is certainly in the running .
